statements: SELECT * FROM sas_geospatial_data;
SELECT id, location_name FROM sas_geospatial_data;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM sas_geospatial_data;
SELECT * FROM sas_geospatial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM sas_geospatial_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sas_geospatial_data;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM sas_geospatial_data WHERE id > 100;
SELECT * FROM sas_geospatial_data WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT location_name FROM sas_geospatial_data ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM sas_geospatial_data WHERE longitude BETWEEN -100 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data;
SELECT location_id, data_type, value, timestamp FROM analytics_data;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM analytics_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT data_type, SUM(value) FROM analytics_data GROUP BY data_type;
SELECT location_name, data_type, value, timestamp FROM geospatial_data INNER JOIN analytics_data ON geospatial_data.id = analytics_data.location_id WHERE value > 100;
SELECT AVG(latitude), MIN(longitude), MAX(value) FROM geospatial_data, analytics_data WHERE geospatial_data.id = analytics_data.location_id;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude < 10 AND longitude > 20;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT customer_name, email, location_name FROM customers c JOIN locations l ON c.location_id = l.location_id;

SELECT location_name, SUM(order_total) AS total_sales FROM locations l JOIN customers c ON l.location_id = c.location_id JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY location_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, industry FROM clients WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT data_type, date FROM analytics_data WHERE data_type LIKE 'Sales%';
SELECT location_id, map_image FROM mapping_data ORDER BY location_id;
SELECT client_name, industry FROM clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1 AND latitude > 40;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE geography IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_name, industry, date FROM clients INNER JOIN analytics_data ON clients.client_id = analytics_data.client_id;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, address, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT region_name, area FROM regions ORDER BY area DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT sale_date, amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE length(email) > 10 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT sale_id, customer_id, location_id, amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY amount DESC, sale_date ASC;
SELECT territory_id, territory_name, region_name FROM territories INNER JOIN regions ON territories.region_id = regions.region_id;
SELECT region_name, SUM(population) AS total_population FROM regions GROUP BY region_name HAVING total_population > 100000;
